scripts.build-package: npm run transpile && npm run replace-jsx && npm run copy-scss
scripts.git-add-commit-push: git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "Publica la versión $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git push
scripts.publish-package: npm run build-package && npm publish --access public && npm run version-bump && npm run git-add-commit-push
scripts.deploy-gh: npm run deploy-gh-pages && npm run publish-package
scripts.deploy-branch-repo: cross-env-shell "PUBLIC_URL=/ REACT_APP_REPO_URL=\"$npm_package_repository_url\"" npm run build && gh-pages -d build -b %npm_config_branch%
scripts.deploys: cross-env-shell "PUBLIC_URL=. REACT_APP_REPO_URL="https://github.com/Jeff-Aporta/camaleon-ui"" react-app-rewired build && gh-pages -d build && npx babel src/framework --out-dir dist && node scripts/replace-jsx.js dist && node scripts/copy-scss.js && npm publish --access public && npm version patch --no-git-tag-version --no-git-commit-hooks && git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit -m "Publica la versión $(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" && git push && cross-env-shell "PUBLIC_URL=/ REACT_APP_REPO_URL="https://github.com/Jeff-Aporta/camaleon-ui"" npm run build && gh-pages -d build -b build-prod
